subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In a high-octane game, Drew Brees tied the N.F.L. single-game record for touchdown passes, and he and Eli Manning combined for 13 touchdown passes, an N.F.L. single-game record.
snippet: In a high-octane game, Drew Brees tied the N.F.L. single-game record for touchdown passes, and he and Eli Manning combined for 13 touchdown passes, an N.F.L. single-game record.
